sentence.Network_en: Swiftness and certitude require strength, and the man had not this strength.
sentence.Network_cn: 敏捷和准确是需要力气的, 他没有这种力气.

sentence.Network_en: We have this definite certitude that Cicippio will be freed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们非常肯定西西皮欧能够获释。

sentence.Network_en: This is why he could paint so sceptically with such certitude.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是为什么他能够带着怀疑主义的态度作画,却又具有如此的确信.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... certification 证明 certitude 必然性 cervical nerve 颈神经.
...certificate证明书；执照（certify+icate→证明的东西）certitude确信；确实discrete分立的（dis分开＋creet区别→分开区别→不同的）.
...话语层面的操作5，真实(verite)与确信(certitude)知与信，同一个认知领域1.

absolute brilliance limen 绝对明度阈限absolute certitude 绝对确定性absolute chance 绝对的偶然
Triste certitude 好伤心 Le froid et l'absence 寒冷与分离 Cet odieux silence 这可恨的静寂 Blanche solitude 白色的孤独 Tu ne viendras pas ce soir 今夜.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin certitudo, from certus 'certain'

entry.def: Certitude is the same as certainty .

example.ex: We have this definite certitude that Cicippio will be freed.
example.tran: 我们非常肯定西西皮欧能够获释。

means.word_mean: 1. total certainty or greater certainty than circumstances warrant

auth_sentence.content: Her face suddenly grips onto certitude Henry Moore.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her face suddenly grips onto certitude Henry Moore.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her face suddenly grips onto certitude Henry Moore.

auth_sentence.content: Her enamelled certitude often did not make her easy to interview.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her enamelled certitude often did not make her easy to interview.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her enamelled certitude often did not make her easy to interview.

auth_sentence.content: They prefer to lie to themselves and to trust who has more Charisma, and to lie down in a bed of certitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: They prefer to lie to themselves and to trust who has more Charisma, and to lie down in a bed of certitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They prefer to lie to themselves and to trust who has more Charisma, and to lie down in a bed of certitude.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cert搞清,区别+ain表示形容词→搞清楚的→肯定的
certain[adj.肯定的]+ty表名词→n.必然,肯定;必然的事
cert搞清,区别+itude状态→确定状态
con共同+cert搞清,区别→一致,和谐→音乐会
cert搞清,区别+ify表动词→搞清楚→证明
